name: CampTix Bangldeshi Payments
author: Tareq Hasan

sections.description:
CampTix Bangladeshi Payment Gateway Solution for Camptix Plugin. Allow visitors to purchase tickets to your online or offline event using Bangladeshi payment gateway, directly from your WordPress or WordCamp website.

Supported Gateways

Only BDT currency is supported.

  • SSLCommerz

About Gateways

SSLCommerz

SSLCommerz is an Online Payment Gateway & Merchant Service Provider of Bangladesh. Register a sandbox account to perform test transactions.

Contribute

Feel free to post your feature requests, issues and pull requests to Camptix Bangladeshi Payments on GitHub.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/bd-camptix-payments directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Camptix -> Setup screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Which payment gateway it supports

Right now it supports SSLCommerz gateway.

Which currencies does it support?

Right now it supports BDT currency only.
